item.description: Update Hiker Rescue; INC#1006; 05:27PM; 3032 Runyon Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vI78Yb; Hollywood Hills West; Urban search and rescue specialists/firefighters rescued both mother, daughter, and canine from the steep slope near Runyon Canyon Road. We are pleased to report no illness or injury was discovered upon evaluation by firefighter-paramedics. Nothing further.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E227 E290 E41 E82 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA41 RH114 T27 T90; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1006; 03:47PM; 3032 Runyon Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vI78Yb; Hollywood Hills West; LAFD has located two females (one adult/one juvenille) with a canine stranded mid slope, unable to return to trail or road. Crews set up a two-line rope system and have sent two rescuers down to make contact and create a rescue plan.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E227 E290 E41 E82 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA41 RH114 T27 T90; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Hiker Rescue; INC#0527; 10:55AM; 2899 E Observatory Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ms9MqW; Griffith Park; Rescuer and patient are safely aboard LAFD airship and will transport directly to local hospital by air. Nothing further.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E227 E290 E35 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA35 RA835 RH114 T27 T90; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0527; 10:18AM; 2899 E Observatory Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ms9MqW; Griffith Park; LAFD crews have located an injured hiker (adult male) and are preparing for a hoist operation to extract him from his remote location.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E227 E290 E35 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA35 RA835 RH114 T27 T90; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0393; 08:37AM; 2162 W 31st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Knmt4P; Jefferson Park; Thirty-two LAFD firefighters extinguished flames (from what appeared to be have started inside the wall and spread up to the attic) in 24 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E215 E226 E26 E294 E34 RA26 RA34 T15 T26 T94; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0393; 08:13AM; 2162 W 31st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Knmt4P; Jefferson Park; One-story craftsman home with smoke showing from the attic. Offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E215 E226 E26 E294 E34 RA26 RA34 T15 T26 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1629; 10:31PM; 10050 S Juniper St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MtaJzE; #Watts; 46 Firefighters took just 34 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire on the second floor of a vacant two story apartment building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC13 E10 E215 E221 E266 E33 E66 RA33 RA57 RA64 RA864 SQ21 T15 T21 T66; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Complete - Hazardous Materials Investigation; INC#1266; 09:23PM; 2050 W John S Gibson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3foQxyW; #Wilmington; 40 Firefighters, including LAFD hazardous materials experts have skillfully stabilized the scene by gaining access to the cargo container and isolating / cooling the burning products densely stored within, including Synthetic Resin with Ethylene Polymers, as well as large Lithium Ion Batteries. No injuries have been reported. Control of the scene will soon be transferred to shipping and Port officials, who will coordinate cleanup; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT17 BT4 E248 E285 E36 E38 E48 EM13 JT1 JT3 RA112 RA36 RA848 SH12 SQ48 T48 T85 UA6; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1629; 09:57PM; 10050 S Juniper St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MtaJzE; #Watts; PRELIM: Heavy fire in one 2 story apartment unit.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC13 E10 E215 E221 E266 E33 E66 RA33 RA57 RA64 RA864 SQ21 T15 T21 T66; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1561; 09:35PM; 2215 E 103rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MA4x90; #Watts; 43 Firefighters took just 22 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire on the second floor of a vacant end unit at a two story apartment building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E221 E264 E33 E65 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T21 T64; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey
